HtmlButton Module¶

class epyk.core.html.HtmlButton.Button(report, text, icon, width, height, htmlCode, tooltip, profile, options)¶
color(color)¶

Change the color of the button background when the mouse is hover

Usage:

rptObj.ui.buttons.remove("remove").color("blue")
Parameters

color – String. the color of the component (text and borders)

disable(background_color=None, color=None)¶
Parameters

  • background_color – String.

  • color – String.

Returns

The htmlObj to allow the chaining

property dom¶

HTML Dom object

Return type

JsHtml.JsHtmlButton

property options¶

Property to set all the possible object for a button

Return type

OptButton.OptionsButton

press(jsPressFncs=None, jsReleaseFncs=None, profile=False)¶

Special click event to keep in memory the state of the component

Usage:

Attributes:
Parameters

  • jsPressFncs –

  • jsReleaseFncs –

  • profile –

property style¶

Property to the CSS Style of the component

Usage:

self.style.css.margin = "5px"
Return type

GrpClsButton.ClassButton

to_word(document)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

to_xls(workbook, worksheet, cursor)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/

Property to the CSS Style of the component

Usage:

self.style.css.margin = "5px"

class epyk.core.html.HtmlButton.ButtonMenuItem(report, selector, parent)¶
click(jsFncs)¶

Javascript click events of the items in the menu

Parameters

jsFncs – List: The Javascript fragments

property js¶

Javascript module of the items in the menu

Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsQueryUi.Autocomplete

on(event, jsFncs, profile=False)¶

Javascript generic events of the items in the menu

Parameters

  • event – String. The JavaScript event

  • jsFncs – List: The Javascript fragments

  • profile – Boolean.

class epyk.core.html.HtmlButton.Buttons(report, data, color, width, height, htmlCode, helper, options, profile)¶
class epyk.core.html.HtmlButton.CheckButton(report, flag, tooltip, width, height, icon, label, htmlCode, options, profile)¶
click(jsFncsTrue, jsFncFalse=None, withColors=True, profile=False)¶

Click even on the checkbox item

Usage:

ch = rptObj.ui.buttons.check(label="Label")

ch.click(rptObj.js.alert(“true”), rptObj.js.alert(“false”))

Parameters

  • jsFncsTrue – Js function or a list of JsFunction to be triggered when checked

  • jsFncFalse – Optional. Js function or a list of JsFunction to be triggered when unchecked

Returns

The htmlObl to allow the chaining

property dom¶

The Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsHtml.JsHtmlButtonMenu

property js¶
Returns

A Javascript Dom object

Return type

JsQueryUi.Autocomplete

property style¶

Property to the CSS Style of the component

Return type

GrpClsButton.ClassButtonCheckBox

class epyk.core.html.HtmlButton.Checkbox(rptObj, records, title, color, width, height, align, htmlCode, filters, tooltip, icon, options, profile)¶
jsAdd(jsData='data', jsDataKey=None, isPyData=False, jsParse=False, jsFnc=None, isUnique=False)¶
Example

c.jsAdd([{“value”: ‘A’, “name”: ‘Test’}], isPyData=True, isUnique=True)

Example

c.jsRemove([1, “A”], isPyData=True)

onDocumentLoadFnc()¶

Pure Javascript onDocumentLoad Function

to_word(document)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

http://python-docx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

to_xls(workbook, worksheet, cursor)¶

Apply the corresponding function to produce the same result in a word document. This function is very specific and it has to be defined in each class.

https://xlsxwriter.readthedocs.io/

tooltip(value, location='top')¶

Add the Tooltip feature when the mouse is over the component. This tooltip version is coming from Bootstrap

Usage:

htmlObj.tooltip("My tooltip", location="bottom")

https://getbootstrap.com/docs/4.1/components/tooltips/

Parameters

  • value –

  • location –

Returns

The Python object self
